manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Cuisinart Purxium H13 HEPA Large Room/Freestanding Air Purifier Purxium Air Purifiers by Cuisinart CAP-500 (Medium Sized Rooms) and the CAP-1000 (Large Sized Rooms) These air purifiers are sleek with a modern look. The CAP-1000 freestanding air purifier is for larger rooms and offers 360 degree, 4-sided intake that provides cleaner, fresher, and odor free air. It comes complete with 4 reusable, metal pre-filters, combination H13 High-Grade HEPA/Active Carbon filters and UV-C light that all work together to capture up to 99.9% of various airborne particles 0.1 Micron or larger including bacteria and various contaminants. The CAP-1000 cycles air up to 1,000* sq. ft. 2x every hour or 500 sq. ft. 4x every hour. The touchscreen controls come with 4 fan speeds, 12-hour timer, sleep mode/night light, UVC light, child safety lock and filter replacement indicator. The 2,500 hour run time rated filters are included. (*Approximately 1,000 sq. ft.)

The Purxium Air Purifiers by Cuisinart so that you can breathe fresher, cleaner air H13 HIGH-GRADE HEPA FILTRATION. Replacement Filter Pack: CAP-1000FPK The HEPA H13 and active carbon filters are combined into one filter. This air purifier filters capture up to 99.9% of airborne particles 0.1 MICRON or larger. Each filter has a 2,500 hour run time. If you run your air purifier 12 hours per day, the filters last 6 months. FEATURES AND FUNCTIONALITY Easy to read touchscreen controls offer a filter replacement indicator, child safety lock, UV-C Light, 12-hour timer, sleep mode/night light, 4 fan speeds, for a customizable experience. PERFECT FOR ANY ROOM Made for any large room in a home or kitchen up to 1000* square feet. This air purifier is specially designed with removable, reusable metal pre-filters that capture various airborne odors and particles in the bedroom, Living room, family room, basement or kitchen. (*Approximately 1,000 sq. ft.) FRESH, CLEAN AIR Breathe cleaner, fresher air with the CAP-1000. The H13 High-Grade HEPA/Active Carbon filters, removable, reusable metal pre-filters and UVC light adds an extra level of disinfection protection.

360 DEGREE, 4-SIDED AIR INTAKE H13 High-Grade HEPA filters capture up to 99.9% of airborne particles 0.1 MICRON or larger including bacteria and various contaminants. Air is brought in through 4-sides and the clean air is pushed out through the top of the unit. UV-C DISINFECTION PROTECTION & POWERFUL DC MOTOR With 360 degree intake on all 4-sides, this powerful DC motor cycles air for a 450 CADR and maximum square footage of coverage. The CAP-1000 filters air up to 1,000* sq. ft. 2x every hour or 500 sq. ft. 4x every hour. The UV-C light offers an added level of disinfection protection. Each filter has a 2,500 hour run time. (*Approximately 1,000 sq. ft.) WASHABLE, REUSABLE METAL PRE-FILTERS, COMBINATION H13 HIGH-GRADE HEPA/ACTIVE CARBON FILTERS AND UV-C LIGHT This air purifier has 4-Stage Filtration! There are (4) washable, reusable pre-filters, (4) combination H13 High-Grade HEPA/Active Carbon Filters, and UV-C light for an added level of disinfection protection. The reusable, metal pre-filters are easy to remove and clean so that you may use them over and over again. They help to capture larger airborne particles such as dust, pet dander and cooking oils for always-fresh and clean, odor-free air.

CAP-1000 H13 HIGH-GRADE HEPA AIR PURIFIER CAP-1000FPK Replacement Filters CAP-1000 CAP-500 H13 HIGH-GRADE HEPA AIR PURIFIER CAP-500FPK Replacement Filters for CAP-500 Coverage Area Up to 1,000 sq. ft. Up to 1,000 sq. ft. Up to 500 sq. ft. Up to 500 sq. ft. H13 HEPA High-Grade Filter ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ CADR - Clean Air Delivery Rate 450 m3/h 450 m3/h 250 m3/h 250 m3/h Removable, Washable Pre-Filter ✓ ✓ Timer 0-12 Hours 0-12 Hours Replace Filter Indicator ✓ ✓ Fan Speeds 4 Speeds 3 Speeds UVC Disinfection Protection ✓ Child Safety Lock ✓ ✓ Sleep Mode and Night LIght ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am very pleased with the air filter. I bought it for my bedroom. It has 3 fan speeds and yes you will hear the fan but it isn’t an annoying sound or that loud. It has a nighttime mode for the lighting in it, which is nice because I don’t like a lot of light at night. It also has a timer if you want to just run it for awhile. I have it sitting on my dresser but the floor is fine as well. Very well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Air Purifiers !!
reviews.reviewText: I have bought 3 of these off Amazon. Some have been gifts; and I am likely to buy at least one more.I am currently using 2 small ones on each side of the bed. They work very well together on low speed without having just 1 of them and running it on higher speed which causes more noise. I am glad that generic filters are now being offered at a lower price. The cap-1000 offers UV light protection to kill viruses and the smaller unit does not. .. It is still a great Air Purifier. Even if the UV light in the Cap-1000 stops working air filtering will still take place bc of circulation of the air through the filters in the Cap 1000 - only UV virus protection is affected. I guess that would be a customer service issue. I guess a person could look into buying a UV light for different rooms. Both of these Cuisinart air purifiers are of very good quality. I am sleeping better at night and my sinus issues from allergies are much better. The Cuisinart air purifiers also filter out odors. They have timers that can be set by touching the clock symbol by tapping it for each hour you want it run before shutoff. They are also easy on the electric bill... 5 Stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I’m typically not one to write reviews but am so pleased with this product I just had to! I have been in the market for an air purifier for a while since my last one died (after only 1 year)! I came across this Cuisinart one and since I’ve had luck with their other products, I thought I would try it out. I am so happy I did! My daughter suffers from many different allergies including pet hair, dust, mold, and whatever else seems to be in the air! She takes medication yet still ends up with itchy eyes and sneezing fits. We have only had this air purifier for a short while but her eyes have cleared up and she hasn’t been sneezing! This is the only change we have made so I have to give credit to the air purifier! Besides the main benefit of clearing the air so my little one can sleep better, the sleek design is also appealing. I really appreciate that Cuisinart doesn’t only take into consideration the quality of their products, but also how it will look in your home. A few of the other features I thought I would mention that I’m loving are the soft night light, the timer, and how quiet the sound is. This is a well thought out product that I would highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice filter for smaller rooms. Easy to find replacement filters. Works if you use good filters.
reviews.reviewText: It's fairly quiet, especially on low. Run on high for 15 or 20 minutes to get a good portion of the air exchanged (filtered) then turn to low to maintain. Not for a large house or apartment, but great for a smaller bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible and powerful air purifier
reviews.reviewText: I bought this purifier due to brand loyalty as I knew nothing about this product but love Cuisinart. Right away after opening the box I pulled this straight up and out then plugged it in. It was running in less than 5 mins! The replacement of the 4 sided cartridge is so easy. I won’t need to worry though as they are good for 2500 hours of use. A red light comes on to let you know it’s time for replacement. Super easy slide out and slide in the new filter assembly. I can wait to start getting some cleaner air in my home. The blue uv light will also add another level of purification. The control panel lights up nicely and is easy to understand. Super quiet I think fan setting 2 and 3 will be perfect for me. Speed 4 moves a lot of air so if it’s in a really big room 4 would be a good choice and it’s not very loud either, a big plus. Good luck on your decision. I hope I was able to help you with some needed info for your own decision.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Air purifier
reviews.reviewText: We just move to a new place and the smell is not that great. Even the testing machine said it's safe to live, but the air purifier def help to clean all the bad smell immediately. we total bought 4 same Cuisinart Air Purifier and used few days. so far very great feedback!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's easy to use and easy to set up
reviews.reviewText: I just received it. I set it up easily and it seems like it's working fine. The fan has 3 levels. The fan is not really loud, but you can hear it on the highest setting. It has a sleep setting which is a low fan and a night light. I tested it, but have not used it through the night. I purchased this because of the horrible air quality over the summer during the Canadian wildfires. I'm sure we will be having more of those events, unfortunately, so I finally bought a purifier. I may buy a second one if it helps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effective and beautiful
reviews.reviewText: I bought this praying for something to help with the air quality in our home- this covers my entire downstairs- it’s quiet and not an eyesore! We’ve tried so many different ones but this is the best hands down
Cumple con la descripción elimina malos olores de forma rápida y es silencioso.
